page.title: 07A Family Day Out
page.content: I am Terri Ann Lancaster.I live at 121 Glan y Nant Fochriw,with my mother, father and brother Wayne.We all went to Barry Island by train.The first thing we did was to go to the beach and I put my bathers on.I had a sandwich and crisps.My cousin blind- folded me and threw me into the sea.At mid day we had dinner.My brother and I rode on the donkeys.Later we walked to the inflatable castle.In the shows my mother and I played darts.I won a Minnie Mouse Poster and she won a Teddy Bear.All the family went on the Ghost Train and The Umbrellas.We went back to see if the castle was open.It was closed so we went back to the station and got on the train home.We got home at 9.45 p.m.
